subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} A pictograph of an empty container, such as a [[chalice]]. The handles are conjoined in the modern form.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * As a component of other characters, {{lang|zh|皿}} can be referred to as {{zh-l|皿字底|mǐnzìdǐ}} or {{zh-l|皿墩兒|mǐndūnr}}.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|器皿|培養皿|美耐皿|北皿|南皿|皿卷|皿器|皿金|金皿|皿字底}}
